True False
[" tabs.length; i++) {\n        var tabTargetId = $(tabs[i]).data('target');\n        var tabTarget   = $('#'+tabTargetId);\n        targetsArray.push(tabTarget);\n      }\n    }\n\n    function tabClick(tabs, targets) {\n      tabs.on('click', function() {\n        var targetId = $(this).data('target');\n        var target   = $('#'+targetId);\n\n        // SHOW / HIDE MODULES\n        for (j=0; j "]
[" targets.length; j++) {\n          var module = targets[j][0];\n\n          if (targetId != module.id) {\n            $(module).addClass('hidden');\n          } else {\n            $(module).removeClass('hidden');\n          }\n        }\n\n        // ADD CURRENT CLASS TO TAB\n        for (k=0; k "]
[" tabs.length; k++) {\n          if (tabs[k] == this) {\n            $(tabs[k]).addClass('current');\n          } else {\n            $(tabs[k]).removeClass('current');\n          }\n        }\n      });\n    }\n\n    // LAZY LOAD IMAGES\n    function lazyLoadImages(images) {\n      for(l=0; images.length ", ' l; l++){\n          var image = images[l];\n          if (typeof image.dataset.lazySrc != "undefined") {\n            if (image.src != image.dataset.lazySrc) {\n              image.src = image.dataset.lazySrc;\n            }\n          }\n        }\n    }\n\n    function lazyLoadEvent() {\n      if ("" == "1") {\n        var tabs = document.querySelectorAll(\'.tab-button\');\n        if (tabs.length ', ' 0) {\n          for(i=0; tabs.length ', " i; i++){\n            if (i == 0) {\n              var targetIdOne     = tabs[i].dataset.target,\n                  tabTargetOne       = document.getElementById(targetIdOne),\n                  tabTargetOneImages = tabTargetOne.getElementsByTagName('img');\n              lazyLoadImages(tabTargetOneImages);\n            }\n\n            tabs[i].addEventListener('click', function() {\n              var tabTargetId     = this.dataset.target,\n                  tabTarget       = document.getElementById(tabTargetId),\n                  tabTargetImages = tabTarget.getElementsByTagName('img');\n              lazyLoadImages(tabTargetImages);\n            });\n          }\n        }\n      }\n    }\n\n    compileTabTargets(tabs, tabTargets);\n    tabClick(tabs, tabTargets);\n    lazyLoadEvent();\n    \n  });\n"]

}); }\n        else{ displayAd("div_gpt_lb_center", dz_final, [[728, 90],[970,250],[970,90],[970,66],[1,1]], "type=leaderboardcenter;" + adParams2 + "" ); }\n}\nelse{\n    if(typeof(Reuters)!=\'undefined\' && typeof(Reuters.info)!=\'undefined\' && typeof(Reuters.info.channel)!=\'undefined\'){\n        displayAd("div_gpt_lb_center", dz_final, [[728, 90],[970,250],[970,90],[970,66],[1,1]], "type=leaderboardcenter;storychannel=" + Reuters.info.channel+ ";" + adParams2 + "" );\n    } else{ displayAd("div_gpt_lb_center", dz_final, [[728, 90],[970,250],[970,90],[970,66],[1,1]], "type=leaderboardcenter;" + adParams2 + "" ); }\t\n}\n']
